name: Eastern Europe Train Sim 2
description:
Take the helm of a powerful locomotive in "Eastern Europe Train Sim 2."

Experience the thrill of driving trains as you transport passengers and goods across breathtaking landscapes. Your mission as a skilled train driver is to navigate safely from station to station, ensuring a smooth and accident-free journey. Be prepared to encounter unexpected challenges along the way, including animals that need to be chased away and dynamic track-switching scenarios. Pay close attention to your surroundings and become the master of the rails!
Game features :
- 3 Modes ( Practice,passengers and cargo)
- Realistic Train Driving
- Diverse Landscapes: Explore the beauty of Eastern Europe as you travel through picturesque landscapes
